mapper.select: Select s.sl_title sl_title, s.sl_content sl_content, s.sl_time sl_time, s.sl_price sl_price, s.sl_regdate sl_regdate, s.sl_hits sl_hits, s.bl_id bl_id, i.priimg_num priimg_num, i.priimg_path priimg_path, i.priimg_name priimg_name, p.pri_num pri_num, p.pri_title pri_title, p.pri_addr pri_addr FROM sharelot2 s, booklot b, privatelot p, privateimage i WHERE s.bl_id = b.bl_id AND b.pri_num = p.pri_num AND p.pri_num = i.pri_num AND s.u_id = #{u_id} AND s.sl_num = #{sl_num}

Select s.sl_num sl_num, s.u_id u_id, s.sl_title sl_title, s.sl_content sl_content, s.sl_time sl_time, s.sl_price sl_price, s.sl_regdate sl_regdate, s.sl_hits sl_hits, s.bl_id bl_id, i.priimg_num priimg_num, i.priimg_path priimg_path, i.priimg_name priimg_name, p.pri_num pri_num, p.pri_title pri_title, p.pri_addr pri_addr, p.pri_weekprice pri_weekprice, p.pri_weekendprice pri_weekendprice, p.pri_lat pri_lat, p.pri_long pri_long, l.bl_date bl_date, u.u_ipath u_ipath, u.u_iname u_iname FROM (select * from sharelot2 WHERE sl_num = #{sl_num}) s, booklot l, (select * from privatelot where pri_booktype = '일단위') p, privateimage i ,userinfo u WHERE s.bl_id = l.bl_id AND l.pri_num = p.pri_num AND l.u_id = u.u_id AND p.pri_num = i.pri_num ORDER BY s.SL_NUM DESC
